articles.title: Bpcl Q4 Results: Standalone Pat Declines Over 82% Yoy To ₹2,131 Cr | Mint - Mint
articles.description: BPCL posted a standalone net profit of  ₹2,130.53 crore in the quarter ending March 31, 2022 (Q4FY22). This is a decline of a whopping 82.15% from the profit of  ₹11,940.13 crore recorded in Q4 of the previous fiscal.
